name: Something Awful - Black Redesign v1.5.3
description:
Credit goes to equinox, who I assume made the style in the first place - but as he has no updated it in a while I felt it was more than overdue.

Something Awful forum black with a dark color scheme. Ads were removed. Fonts were changed to Calibri/Consolas. If I've missed anything please let me know.
additional_info: Changes done from v1.2: v1.3: * Fixed the search function, so you can see what the forums are called without disabling the style. The font is now black when forums are selected and gray when not selected. * Fixed the reply function, so you can see what you're typing without disabling the style. The font is now black instead of white and the background is still white. * Fixed the spoiler tags, so the text within the spoiler tags don't show up until you mouse over the tag. * Fixed the ad removal. * Fixed the color of the navigation menu in the user control panel. * Fixed the archives 'time machine' menu. * Fixed the lone blue 'ratings' table by altering the selector entry. * Fixed the pre code box, so you can can properly see what's written in it. v1.3.1: * Fixed the Rating and Votes table in The Film Dump so they have the same color as the rest of the tables. * Fixed the Votes column in The Film Dump so it has the same color as the rest of the columns. v1.3.2: * Fixed the Relevance and Replies row and column on the search results page. v1.3.3: * Fixed the titles and reg dates so they're not dark, but light. v1.3.4: * Fixed the system message box. v1.3.5: * Fixed several instances of dark text on the page, for example the 'pages' text and the 'mods' text. * Fixed the color scheme of elements in the search category and the search results category, also fixed the text color of those elements. v1.3.6: * Fixed the background in FYAD and thus also BYOB. * Removed the ad in FYAD. v1.3.7: * Fixed the Account Features box and adjusted text color of a few items. * Fixed the Support Email box in Support. v1.3.8: * Removed the "navigation" picture on all the "Retarded Forum for Assholes" boards. v1.3.9: * Reverted the author names on RFA boards back to normal forum convention. * Fixed the quote box on RFA boards. * Fixed the color of current page number on RFA boards. * Made some changes to other CSS due to the fact that fixing RFA boards made unwanted changes to other boards. v1.4.0: * Reverted the opacity change on posts imposed by the forums cancer 'feature'. v1.4.1: * Changed the color of specific pieces of text in the BBcodex from blue to red to make it more readable. * Made the color of the author/date text on entries in the SAclopedia a lighter shade of gray. v1.4.2: * Fixed the 'Forums CLOSED' box. v1.4.3: * Reverted some forced italic text in the RFA boards to normal text. * Fixed color of posts you've already seen, if you've enabled that in the options - Though the functionality isn't retained because I couldn't make it make sense in the colorscheme. v1.4.4: * Links are now properly spoiled. * Current page when using search is now dark gray instead of blue. * Made the CSS more consistent: Color names turned into actual hex colors, shorthand hex colors expanded, and some indenting. v1.4.5: * Private messages were unaffected by the style, they're affected by it now. v1.4.6: * Fixed up the funbox in FYAD so it's actually readable and more in line with the rest of the style. v1.4.7: * Before the bottom of a single post page was entirely black, meaning unaffected by the css changes. That's fixed now. * Fixed some indentation errors in the file. v1.4.8: * Removed lingering margin-left that showed up on the site if you were logged out. v1.4.9: * Removed 50% opacity on icon bars on main page if logged out. v1.5.0: * Removed background-color on select element as it displayed incorrectly in Chrome but removing it makes no difference in Firefox v1.5.1: * Reverted opacity change made in v1.4.9 * Made some changes to the changelog v1.5.2: * Removed Digg button, because who uses that? v1.5.3: * Changed color of code blocks to white. * -moz-border-radius gives errors, so replaced with border-radius v1.5.4 * Removed background color of code blocks. --- Note: GreaseMonkey version probably doesn't work. Note: I'd advice you to disable "Mark posts on pages I've already seen in a different color" in the Edit Options, as there is no difference between normal colorscheme and the colorscheme it uses if you have that option enabled. It's better than before v1.4.3 where the colorscheme from the original css was intact, but I couldn't make the colors make sense, so I just made it the same. Note on FYAD: If anyone knows how to revert the stylesheet that FYAD uses, then please tell me how to do it. Note on Posting Gloryhole table: Changing the color scheme of the table there makes it look really awkward. I don't know how to handle it. Note on RFA closed threads: This shows up as the original color of the background, I don't know how to fix this. Note: On January 1st, 2013 the styling of the forums was changed and so this userstyle really does not work anymore. Right now I don't really have much desire to fix it, but who knows. Last updated on the 17th of April, 2011.
